name: 简约商务主题
description: 经典黑白灰配色，专业商务风格，简洁而不失格调
author: FlowEdit Team

inlineStyles.em: font-style: italic; color: rgb(75, 85, 99); font-weight: 500; letter-spacing: 0.3px;
inlineStyles.i: font-style: italic; color: rgb(75, 85, 99); font-weight: 500; letter-spacing: 0.3px;
inlineStyles.u: text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-color: rgb(107, 114, 128); text-underline-offset: 3px; text-decoration-thickness: 1px;
inlineStyles.code: font-family: 'SF Mono', 'Monaco', 'Menlo', monospace; font-size: 0.9em; background: rgb(243, 244, 246); color: rgb(55, 65, 81); padding: 0.2em 0.5em; border-radius: 4px; border: 1px solid rgb(229, 231, 235); font-weight: 500;
inlineStyles.a: color: rgb(59, 130, 246); text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-color: rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.5); text-underline-offset: 2px;

globalStyles.container: <section style='box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 24px 20px; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.6; color: rgb(31, 41, 55); font-family: "SF Pro Text", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif; letter-spacing: 0.3px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(229, 231, 235);'>{{content}}</section>
globalStyles.references:
参考文献

{{links}}

blocks.paragraph: {{text}}

header.h1: {{text}}
header.h2: {{text}}
header.h3: {{text}}

quote.template:
{{text}}

{{?caption}}

optional.caption: <footer style='text-align: right; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(107, 114, 128); font-weight: 500; margin-top: 12px;'>— {{value}}</footer>

blocks.delimiter: <section style='display: flex; justify-content: center; margin: 3em 0;'><hr style='width: 60%; height: 1px; background: rgb(229, 231, 235); border: none;' /></section>

optional.caption: <figcaption style='margin-top: 12px; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(107, 114, 128); font-style: italic; line-height: 1.4; font-weight: 400;'>{{value}}</figcaption>

blocks.code: {{code}}

ordered.wrapper: {{items}}

unordered.wrapper: {{items}}

checklist.item: • {{checkbox}}{{content}}
